pages.title: Input Module
pages.text: Place filled Productive Bees bee cages here to run bees inside the apiary. Each input slot processes against a matching flower from the Flower Module.

pages.title: Flower Module
pages.text: Provide flowers or valid blocks for your bees. Different bees require different flowers or blocks (same rules as Productive Bees). The apiary pairs each input slot with a flower slot when producing.

pages.title: Output Module
pages.text: Collect the produced items here. The apiary distributes results across available output slots and stacks, respecting space.

pages.title: Upgrade Module
pages.text: Accepts Productive Bees upgrades (e.g., base time, productivity, comb block upgrades). Effects are applied to apiary processing while keeping PB rules.
